frontmatter.title: A/B Testing in Ruby On Rails
frontmatter.description: In this post I am going to demonstrate, step-by-step, a way to A/B test new features from within Ruby-On-Rails using FluidFeatures. FluidFeatures is currently in closed-beta and requires request for inclusion in the beta program. We are looking for enthusiastic A/B testers, so we can get feedback on the service before releasing it to the masses.
